title: gloo 3.2 Cu.Ft. Single Door Compact Refrigerator with Freezer - Slide Out Glass Shelf, Perfect for Homes, Offices, Dorms - Black
description: The Gloo 3.2 Cu.Ft. Single Door Compact Refrigerator with Freezer is the ideal solution for homes, offices, and dorms. Featuring a sleek black design, it includes a slide-out glass shelf for flexible storage, making it easy to organize your food and beverages. The integrated freezer compartment offers added convenience for frozen items. Compact yet spacious, this refrigerator combines functionality and style, fitting perfectly into any small space while ensuring your essentials stay cool and fresh.

title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra Cell Phone, 256GB AI Smartphone, Unlocked Android, 50MP Zoom Camera, Long Battery Life, S Pen, US Version, 2024, Titanium Violet
description: The SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra is a powerhouse AI smartphone with 256GB of storage, featuring a stunning Titanium Violet finish. Unlocked for flexibility, it boasts a 50MP zoom camera for exceptional photography, a long-lasting battery for all-day use, and the convenience of the S Pen. Released in 2024, this US version combines cutting-edge technology and sleek design, perfect for any tech enthusiast.

title: SAMSUNG 55-Inch Class Crystal UHD 4K DU7200 Series HDR Smart TV w/Object Tracking Sound Lite, PurColor, Motion Xcelerator, Mega Contrast, Q-Symphony (UN55DU7200, 2024 Model)
description:
SAMSUNG 55-Inch Class Crystal UHD 4K DU7200 Series HDR Smart TV Description

The SAMSUNG 55-Inch Class Crystal UHD 4K DU7200 Series HDR Smart TV offers an immersive viewing experience with its vibrant PurColor technology and crisp 4K resolution. Featuring Object Tracking Sound Lite, it delivers dynamic audio that follows the action on-screen. The Motion Xcelerator ensures smooth, lag-free visuals for fast-paced scenes, while Mega Contrast enhances depth and detail. Q-Symphony harmonizes the TV and soundbar for a superior audio experience. Sleek and modern, this 2024 model brings cutting-edge entertainment to your living room.

title: Champion Men'S Tshirt, Classic Graphic Tshirt Soft And Comfortable T-Shirts For Men, Script Logo Reg. Or Big & Tall
description: Elevate your casual style with the Champion Men's Classic Graphic T-Shirt. Crafted from soft, comfortable fabric, this tee features a timeless script logo and comes in regular or big & tall sizes. Perfect for everyday wear, it combines classic design with a relaxed fit, making it an essential addition to any wardrobe.

title: Amazfit GTS 3 Smart Watch 42mm for Android iPhone, Alexa Built-In, GPS, 12-Day Battery Life, Fitness Sports Watch with 150 Sports Modes, AMOLED Display, Sleep Heart Rate Health Tracker, Black
description: The Amazfit GTS 3 Smart Watch combines style and functionality with its 42mm AMOLED display, built-in Alexa, and GPS. Compatible with both Android and iPhone, it offers 150 sports modes and comprehensive health tracking, including sleep and heart rate monitoring. Enjoy up to 12 days of battery life on a single charge. The sleek black design and advanced features make it an ideal companion for fitness enthusiasts and tech-savvy users alike.

title: Nike Air Jordan 4 Retro Big Kids
description: The Nike Air Jordan 4 Retro Big Kids combines classic style with modern comfort. Featuring a durable leather upper and iconic mesh panels, this sneaker delivers both a sleek look and breathability. The signature Air cushioning in the midsole provides superior support and comfort, while the rubber outsole ensures excellent traction. Designed for young athletes and sneaker enthusiasts alike, the Air Jordan 4 Retro offers a timeless design with a perfect blend of style and functionality.

title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Lights,Powerful Crystal Clear Sound,IPX5 Waterproof,All Day Playtime,AUX&TF-Card Input,Bluetooth 5.3,TWS Paring,Small Wireless Speaker for Outdoor,Gift Ideas
description:
【Immersive Sound】: Experience stunning 15W（20W peak) sound in a compact design. With zero distortion audio, this Bluetooth speaker delivers loud highs, crisp midrange, and full bass for an immersive listening experience. With up to 15 hours of playtime on a single charge, enjoy your favorite tunes all day and night without interruption
【Portable Design】: Compact and lightweight at 4.5 inches high and 3.07 inches in diameter, this speaker is perfect for on-the-go use. It features a TF card slot (supports WAV / FLAC / APE / MP3 formats), a 3.5mm AUX input port, Type-C fast charging, and a lanyard for convenient carrying
【Dynamic Beat-Synced Light Show】: Enjoy an exciting light show that dances to the rhythm of your music. With vibrant LED lights that sync with the beat, this speaker adds an extra dimension to your listening experience
【360° Stereo Pairing】: Enjoy true wireless stereo sound by pairing two speakers together. With 360° coverage, you can enjoy loud 30W music in any setting, whether it's at home, parties, the beach, park, or elsewhere
【Advanced Bluetooth 5.3】: Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip, this speaker ensures fast pairing and a stable connection. It also features a built-in microphone for high-quality calls and automatic reconnection to the last device used

title: Beginning Node.js, Express & MongoDB Development
description: In this book, we take you on a fun, hands-on and pragmatic journey to learning Node.js, Express and MongoDB development. You'll start building your first Node.js app within minutes. Every chapter is written in a bite-sized manner and straight to the point as I don’t want to waste your time (and most certainly mine) on the content you don't need. In the end, you will have the skills to create a blog app and deploy it to the Internet.

title: Java for Web Development: Create Full-Stack Java Applications with Servlets, JSP Pages, MVC Pattern and Database Connectivity (English Edition)
description:
Play around JavaBeans, NetBeans IDE, and build strong foundation of web development concepts

Key Features

● Extensive demonstrations of Servlets and JSP in action, including various instances.

● Prepares you to succeed in Java Full Stack and Web Programming Interviews.

title: Iberia Basmati Rice Jar, 2 Pounds, Extra Long Grain, Naturally Aged Indian White Basmati Rice, Natural Basmati Rice in Food Grade Jar.
description:
This 2 lb jar of Iberia Basmati Rice is a versatile ingredient for a wide variety of main and side dishes. Use it in curry, pilaf or other recipes. Iberia basmati rice has a pleasant natural fragrance that enhances the presentation and flavor of your meals. It's easy to cook, so you can prepare other dishes at the same time. The burlap bag has a zipper and carrying handle on top to make storage and transport easier. Sold in Sealed Food grade gourmet pet plastic jars for convenience.
Rich, buttery flavor and a pearly white luster
Grown in the foothills of the Himalayas as it has been for centuries
Aged with patience and care for up to 18 months
The connoisseur's choice. The finest basmati for the finest cuisine.

title: Keyboard
description:
About this item
Mini portable 60% compact layout: MK-Box is a 68 keys mechanical keyboard have cute small size, separate arrow keys and all your F-keys you need, can use it for gaming or work while saving space.
Mechanical red switch: characterized for being linear and smoother, slight key sound has no paragraph sense with minimal resistance, but fast action without a tactile bump feel which makes it easier to tap the keyboard.
Classic charming blue LED backlit: Customize multiple illuminated LED light effects, supports about 15 backlight modes, press Fn + Ins can control it, FN + ←/→ control backlight speed, FN + ↑/↓ control backlight brightness.
Full anti-ghosting keyboard: all 68 keys are no conflict, black grey red mash up design, ergonomic suspension double-color injection keycap, double kickstand feet adjustable typing angle and detachable usb cable, both practical and beautiful.
Extensive compatibility: MageGee MK-Box mechanical keyboards use USB 2.0 connector making it compatible with Windows (2000, XP, ME, Vista, 7, 8), Linux and Mac, plug and play, no drivers or software required.
